text: "What's My Name", is a song performed by China Anne McClain, Thomas Doherty and Dylan Playfair, was released as second single on June 2, 2017 by Walt Disney Records. ==Live performances== On July 17, Dove Cameron, Sofia Carson, China Anne McClain, Cameron Boyce, Booboo Stewart and Dianne Doan performed a mashup of "Ways to Be Wicked" and "What's My Name", both original songs from the movie musical on Good Morning America. ==Music video== The video was directed by Kenny Ortega and released on June 14, 2017. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! scope="col" | Chart (2017) ! scope="col" | Peak position |- ! Canada (Canadian Hot 100) | style="text-align:center;"| 94 |- ! US Billboard Hot 100 | style="text-align:center;"| 61 |- ! US Kid Digital Songs (Billboard) | style="text-align:center;"| 3 |- ! US Streaming Songs (Billboard) | style="text-align:center;"| 38 |- |} ==Certification== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- !scope="col"|Country !scope="col"|Date !scope="col"|Format !scope="col"|Label |- !scope="row"|United States | June 2, 2017 | Digital download | Walt Disney |- |} ==References== Category:2017 singles Category:2017 songs Category:Walt Disney Records singles Category:Songs written by Antonina Armato Category:Songs written by Tim James (musician) Category:Songs written by Tom Sturges Category:Song recordings produced by Rock Mafia Category:Songs from Descendants (franchise) Category:Songs written by IN-Q
title: What's My Name (Descendants song)
